Service Details: - Volunteer-driven charity which provides a host of different programs and adaptive equipment to adults and children with disabilities- Also provides adaptive sports programs such as Powderhounds Adaptive Snow Sports, Power Wheelchair Soccer, Wheelchair basketball and more- Offers a wide assortment of adaptive equipment such as Adult & Junior Trail Riders, Pediatric Pro-cycle, PetraBikes, and Landeez All Terrain Wheelchairs which may be borrowed by members- Offers a transportation program, including a wheelchair accessible van, which also may be borrowed to members of the program
